analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Core.useDragonSpecialPeacefulSkill (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#430-438):
	External calls:
	- dragonCore.useSpecialPeacefulSkill(_sender,_id,_target) (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#434-437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPeacefulSkillsUsageDates (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#437-438)
_counter in Core.getDragonChildren (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#500) is a local variable never initialiazed
gen in Core.getEgg (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#476-477) is a local variable never initialiazed

Core.sendToNest.owner (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#339-340) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#152)

Core.getDragonChildren has external calls inside a loop:
	- i <= dragonGetter.getAmount() && _counter < 10 (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#502-510)

Core.getDragonChildren has external calls inside a loop:
	- (_parents,None) = eggCore.get(eggs[i]) (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#518)

Core.getDragonChildren has external calls inside a loop:
	- _parents = dragonGetter.getParents(i) (/unique_contracts/0xa4ec8e6ce545dfc3197724bec6db486b1558a35e.sol#503-504)
